Have been lurking on the group for months now and have learned quite a bit, 
thanks all! Does anyone have any suggestions on where to get a credible 
appraisal? I am in a he said she said situation and am being told two 
drastically different values for the same item. I need another opinion (or 
three or four). 

Thanks!
